Ares shoots the dagger away
Ares: You'll have to better then that.
Ares then gets shot by prowl and points all of his guns at prowl and fires.
Sixshot's wings get hit so he goes crahsin gto the ground. Right before he 
hits the ground he goes in assault mode and charges Torca
Serpentor pulls the dagger out of him in pain only to be shot down by 
Smokescreen. He also pulls out a gun and jumps at Smokescreen firing.
Shuko dodges Ramulus's shots and transforms into jet and divebombs the ram.
Hades continues going forward after Striker moves out of the way, and looses 
his balance. He recovers quickly and still continues assaulting Striker.
Anubis stupidly swallows the charge while in beast mode.
